issue.title: [CF 1225] [PTR] Unit(s) to watch: group not working
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Having "Unit(s) to watch" set to group does not seem to work on PTR.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
8.0.0 r106 (g9a1cfac)

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No lua error occurred.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
The following is the export string of an icon that will show when someone in party/raid is casting Hearthstone. It works on live, but not on PTR, tested on myself casting Hearthstone while alone, in a party, and in a raid.

^1^T^SUnit^Sgroup ^SType^Scast ^SName^SHearthstone ^SEnabled^B ^t^N74003^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user neoxz04 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1225 | Raw

comments.body:
Thanks for the report - should be fixed now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
